esim.network_desc: eSIM connects to 5G/4G LTE in supported countries. See full product information for network details for a specific country. 5G availability depends on network coverage, regional device specifications, and phone settings. Where 5G is not available the eSIM will provide high quality 4G LTE network connection subject to network availability.
esim.ip_routing_desc: IP routing determines where your internet traffic exits onto the public web, and websites may use this to guess the country you are in, even if you're somewhere else.
esim.speed_desc: Full data speeds - no daily limits, no throttling.
esim.esim_start: Please start using the eSIM no more than 2 months after purchase.
esim.esim_compatible: Usable only with eSIM compatible phones and tablets which are not carrier locked. If in doubt, please check the FAQ section.
esim.connects_to_network: Connects to Zain network in Saudi Arabia with 4G LTE or 5G speeds.
esim.full_speed: Full data speeds - no daily limits, no throttling. Mobile hotspot is supported.
esim.one_time_package: One-time prepaid package. No auto-renewals, no contracts.
esim.validity_start: Validity will start upon downloading the eSIM to your device and connecting to network.
esim.scan_qr: Simply scan the QR code to download and use the eSIM. No other activation or registration steps needed.
esim.data_only_esim: This is a data-only eSIM. It does not come with a phone number.
esim.faq1: Does my phone support eSIM technology?
esim.faq2: Can I use my physical SIM along with the eSIM?
esim.faq3: I already have an active eSIM in my phone, can I use your service?
esim.faq4: Can I use Mobile Hotspot or Tethering with my eSIM?
esim.faq_answer1:
The sure way you can verify if your phone is compatible:

iPhone: Go Settings -> Cellular (or Mobile Data). If you see ‘Add Cellular Plan’ or ‘Add Mobile Plan’, the phone supports eSIM.
Samsung: Go Settings -> Connections -> SIM Card Manager. If you see ‘Add Mobile Plan’, the phone supports eSIM.
Google Pixel: Go Settings -> Networks & Internet -> SIMs -> ‘+Add more’. If you are using Pixel 4/4a or a later model, it will be there.

IMPORTANT!
Some models have exceptions depending on models and markets. Operator locked devices: If your device is locked to a specific carrier due to a contract, it needs to be unlocked first to be able to use the eSIMs sold on our platform.
esim.faq_answer2: Yes! With dual-SIM functionality you can have both your physical SIM and eSIM active at the same time.
esim.faq_answer3: Yes, your phone can store many eSIM profiles at once. You can choose which one to use in your phone settings.
esim.faq_answer4: Yes! Mobile hotspot feature is enabled in all of our products, except if explicitly mentioned in the product details.
esim.destinations_networks_desc: The operator can change the networks the eSIM connects to without notice.

device-modal.compatible_device_search_desc: Dial *#06# on your phone and make sure EID exists. You can also find it in your phone settings.
device-modal.locked_devices: Locked devices from carriers are not supported!
device-modal.china_devices: Devices from China & HK do not support eSIM!

help.scan_qr: Place the QR code you’ve received inside the phone camera frame to scan the code.
help.go_back_mobile: Go back to Mobile Service and Select on Mobile Data Options.
help.slide_two_fingers: Slide two fingers downwards starting from the top of the screen.
help.go_back_connections: Go back to Connections and Select Mobile networks.
help.toggle_data_roaming: Select the toggle button next to Data Roaming to turn the function on or off.

toubleshooting.delete_esim_question: How do I delete my MilliySim eSIM once I’ve used up my data?
toubleshooting.delete_esim_answer: To delete your MilliySim eSIM after using up your data, simply go to your device's settings, select the eSIM, and choose the option to remove or delete it. There is no need to delete your eSIM once you have finished using it. However, if you want to delete it, you can go to your phone’s SIM card manager.
toubleshooting.lost_qr_question: What should I do if I’ve deleted or lost the QR code for my eSIM?
toubleshooting.lost_qr_answer: If you've lost or deleted the QR code for your eSIM, you can request a new one through your MilliySim account or contact customer support for assistance. If you cannot find the QR code or have deleted it by mistake, please get in touch with us by sending an email to support@milliysim.uz or via our online chat, and we’ll resend the code to you. Our customer support team is available 24/7. There’s a solution for everything, but it’s best to try not to lose your QR code since it’s essential for installing your eSIM.
toubleshooting.qr_not_working_question: My QR code isn’t working, what should I do?
toubleshooting.qr_not_working_answer:
If you're having difficulty scanning your QR code, we've made a checklist to help you figure out the issue:

Step 1: Confirm that your phone is compatible with eSIMs. If you are unsure if it’s compatible, please refer to one of our guides.

Step 2: Confirm that you are connected to Wi-Fi, as you cannot install a MilliySim eSIM without Wi-Fi.

Step 3: Try setting up your eSIM manually. Simply enter the details provided.

Step 4: Did you already scan the QR code? If so, you may have already installed the eSIM successfully. To check, go into settings, and navigate to your Cellular/SIM card settings.

Step 5: If none of these steps worked, feel free to reach out to our 24/7 support team! You can reach out via email or live chat.
toubleshooting.esim_qr_arrival_question: How long does it take for an eSIM QR code to arrive?
toubleshooting.esim_qr_arrival_answer:
The eSIM QR code typically arrives within a few minutes to an hour after purchase, depending on the provider.
Check your email or account for updates.

A MilliySim eSIM QR code is sent out immediately after you buy it.
You should receive an email within a couple of minutes.

If you don’t see the email in your inbox, check your spam folder.
If you haven’t received your code after over 10 minutes, contact us via our online chat, and we’ll sort it out for you.
toubleshooting.esim_usage_question: How many times can I use my eSIM?
toubleshooting.esim_usage_answer:
You can use your MilliySim eSIM multiple times, depending on your plan. It can be reactivated and used for various trips or data plans without needing a new SIM card.

Your eSIM can only be activated on one device.
If you delete the eSIM from your phone, you cannot reuse it.
You cannot scan the QR code on two devices, but on specific plans, you can share data between devices by adjusting the settings on your phone.
toubleshooting.delete_data_question: How do I request MilliySim to delete my data?
toubleshooting.delete_data_answer:
1. Sign in to your MilliySim account on either the web.

2. Go to the Account Management page and click on "Delete my account".

3. Confirm the deletion — all your data will be deleted, and you will no longer have access to your account.

steps.title: How does the eSIM work?
steps.step1_desc: From unlimited data to fixed data and even plans with calls and hotspots, we have the right plan for you.
steps.step2_desc: Choose the plan that suits you best and buy your eSIM card from our website or app. You will receive an email with your QR code.
steps.step3_desc: It's easy. Just scan the QR code we send you and turn on data roaming from your settings. Now you can enjoy it on your trip.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about the eSIM
faq.q1: When does my data plan start?
faq.a1: Your plan starts the moment you activate your eSIM by scanning the QR code on your smartphone.
faq.q2: Can I make phone calls and send messages with the eSIM?
faq.a2: Unfortunately, the Japan plan only allows you to use mobile data. It does not include a phone number for mobile calls or messages. You can still make calls using apps like WhatsApp or Telegram.
faq.q3: When will I receive my eSIM?
faq.a3: Once you purchase an eSIM, you will receive it immediately to your email address. You then just need to scan the QR code to activate the SIM. Note that no refunds can be made once you purchase your eSIM. See our refund policy for more information.
faq.q4: What is the network speed of the eSIM?
faq.a4: The eSIM offers maximum speed coverage. But bear in mind that in some areas of limited coverage there may be a lower speed connection.
faq.q5: Do I have to activate data roaming on my device?
faq.a5: Yes. To ensure that your eSIM gets the best coverage, you must turn on data roaming on your mobile settings. This will not incur any additional charges, as long as you have already set up the eSIM.
faq.q6: What do I do if I delete or lose my eSIM's QR code?
faq.a6: If you cannot find the code, please contact our 24/7 customer support team at support@getroamify.com or our online chat function. We will resend the code to your email.
faq.q7: What happens if I use up my data or my days of validity?
faq.a7: If you use all your data or run out of days, your eSIM card will no longer work and you will lose internet connection.
faq.q8: Can I renew or extend the data on my eSIM?
faq.a8: Yes, you can do so by logging into your customer panel on the MilliySim website. You will find the data plans you can purchase there. Once you've made your purchase, it will be activated immediately on the eSIM you have linked.
faq.q9: Can I share data with other devices?
faq.a9: Yes, you can share data with other devices. You can do this by activating the hotspot on your device.
faq.q10: How do I set up the eSIM on my device?
faq.a10: Once you make your purchase, we will send you an email with precise instructions to install your eSIM in two ways: by scanning the QR code or by copying and pasting the manual installation codes. To install with the first option, it is essential that the QR code is printed or on another device. Otherwise, you can follow the manual installation instructions for your MilliySim eSIM. If your device is iOS, go to Settings → Cellular → Add eSIM and scan the QR code or paste the manual installation codes sent to your email. Then follow the on-screen instructions to select your new eSIM for mobile data and calls. If your device is Android, follow the instructions we will email you to install your MilliySim eSIM. Remember that your MilliySim data plan should only be activated when you arrive at your destination. Once there, select your MilliySim eSIM as your preferred option to make calls, then activate data roaming and the MilliySim calling plan. All our eSIM products come with complete instructions for easy setup. If you have any questions or need help, don't hesitate to contact our support team. We are available 24/7.
faq.q11: When should I set up my eSIM?
faq.a11: Set up your eSIM before your departure. Once you reach your destination, just activate the data plan and turn on data roaming. We recommend you print the QR code and take it with you on your trip just in case. Remember that you need internet access to activate the eSIM. Setup is quick, and you’ll be able to enjoy your data plan right away.
faq.q12: How can I check how much data and minutes do I have left?
faq.a12: To check your remaining data balance, simply log in to our web app using the access details sent via email when you made your purchase. You can also check your data balance in your device's data settings. To check your remaining minutes balance for making or receiving calls, please contact our support team.
faq.q13: Can I use my physical SIM card and MilliySim eSIM at the same time?
faq.a13: Yes! You can keep your physical SIM card with your MilliySim eSIM simultaneously on your device. Just make sure you choose your eSIM as your default voice line and preferred option for mobile data in your device settings. Please note that if you leave your physical SIM card activated, you might get extra roaming fees from your network provider.
